meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to one millionth of a liter.
meanings.sent1: I measured the liquid in the experiment using microliters.
meanings.sent2: The scientist carefully pipetted 5 microliters of the solution.
meanings.sent3: The tiny fairy needed only a few microliters of dew to make her potion.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like microliters of stardust in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The sound of rain falling was as gentle as microliters of water dripping from a leaf.

meanings.definition: A microliter is a metric unit of volume equal to one millionth of a liter.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacy technician measured the medication in microliters for accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The lab equipment was calibrated to dispense microliters of liquid precisely.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a microliter of vanilla extract to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like microliters of joy overflowing.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight filtered through the leaves in tiny microliters of brightness.
